scripts.init: npm install && npm run boot -- --scope=@tubecrown/dev && npm run build-dev && npm run boot && npm run build
scripts.clean-full: npm run clean && node ./scripts/tc-dev run clean-full && lerna clean --yes
scripts.build-dev: docker build -t tubecrown/dev-nodejs -f docker/dev-nodejs.dockerfile ./docker && cd ./tools/dev && npm run build
scripts.format-full: node ./scripts/tc-dev run prettier && npm run format
scripts.watch: npm run build && node ./scripts/tc-dev watch build ./tmp/build-info.txt
